concerts.title: Blockchain 101
concerts.description: This two-day workshop offers participants an engaging introduction to Blockchain technology. On Day 1, participants will learn blockchain concepts by playing a widely known boardgame, followed by an Ideation session where they will brainstorm and explore innovative ways to use blockchain technology. Day 2 focuses on pitching these ideas during the Ideathon Pitching session, followed by a Panel Discussion. The event concludes with the announcement of results and prize distribution with a prizepool of 700 USD. This workshop provides hands-on learning and problem-solving experience in the blockchain space, offering participants the chance to showcase their creativity and win exciting prizes. Day 1 runs from 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM, and Day 2 runs from 10:00 AM to 2:30 PM.

venue.name: Taylor's University Lakeside Campus
venue.parking: Free open-air parking available behind the university
venue.howToGetThere: LT27 is located at Level 1 of Block C. From the parking area, walk to LT1, continue to LT2 and walk straight, and at the first junction turn right to reach LT27.

concerts.additionalInfo:
Enhance your blockchain knowledge through interactive games and workshops, then participate in an Ideathon to develop innovative solutions and pitch your ideas for a brighter digital future! 

**Judging Criteria**

1. Problem Statement (15 points)

‚Ä¢ Is the problem well-defined?

‚Ä¢ Is the problem significant and impactful enough to create a solution?

2. Solution & Innovation (40 points)

‚Ä¢ What is the proposed solution?

‚Ä¢ Is the solution innovative, creative, and unique?

‚Ä¢ Does it stand out from generic or already existing ideas?

3. Business Case (10 points)

‚Ä¢ Is there a clear path to monetization or sustainability?

‚Ä¢ How viable is the business model in the long term?

4. Technical Feasibility (5 points)

‚Ä¢ Does the idea demonstrate technical feasibility?

‚Ä¢ Optional: Is there a prototype, such as code or a Figma design?

5. Pitching & Demo (15 points)

‚Ä¢ How compelling and clear are the slides and the pitch?

‚Ä¢ Does the presentation effectively convey the value of the idea?

6. Why Blockchain? (15 points)

‚Ä¢ Does the idea justify using blockchain technology?

‚Ä¢ Is blockchain essential to the solution, or is it just an optional add-on?

**Judging Decisions**
- The judges' decisions are final and binding.

**Prize Distribution per Team**
- First Place: 140 USD
- Second Place: 90 USD
- Third Place: 60 USD
- 4th to 10th Place: 30 USD each
- 11th to 20th Place: 20 USD each

**Submission Requirements**
- Video presentation (3-5 minutes) explaining your solution
- Pitch deck/slides
- Optional coding or Figma 
- Dealine to submission for Google Form is 22/12/2024 10:00 a.m.
- Team Registration Link: [Click here to register your team](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeiZqX1Q0q5gp1ivYbksA5pYJVYLeI5UdeeKsAotzRIL7HwPA/viewform)
- Feedback on using the ticketing platform and the best feedback will win a RM 30 Starbucks gift card: [Submit your feedback](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdo9kao2_Ue2WXSH25dXCfMjpcTC2IM7QxwaW1NZwViy90bXg/viewform?usp=dialog)
- Ideathon Project Submission Link: [Submit your project](https://forms.gle/dPvRV8PTJq3oHxjy8)

**Summary for Participants:**
- Hands-on Blockchain Workshop with a widely known boardgame
- Access to expert panel discussion
- Refreshment provided
- Ideathon participation with the opportunity to win prizes
- Certificates for participation

**Expected Outcomes:**
- Participants will gain a deeper understanding of blockchain technology and its potential applications.
- Participants will learn to collaborate effectively in teams to create conceptual solutions.
- Winners will receive prizes based on the creativity and feasibility of their ideas.

Get ready for an evening of exploration into the world of blockchain, AI, and Web3 ‚Äî whether you're just starting out or already building in the space. What to Expect: üí° Insights from IOTA & MYBW: Learn from Web3 innovators üöÄ Insider Stories: How experts built impactful careers in Web3 üåê Global & Local Insights: Trends from the Malaysian & global markets üîç Industry Insights: Current market job opportunities for students from all backgrounds üêù Crypto Markets: Why big players are investing in blockchain. This is your moment to plug into the industry of web3. Let's make it a night of ideas, innovation, and connection.

concerts.title: Mega Hackathon Certificate
concerts.description: üöÄ SuperteamMY Mega Hackathon Certificate Minting for Top 30 Finalists! This hackathon is designed to onboard new developers and groom aspiring founders, helping them launch and kickstart their web3 journey in the Solana ecosystem. Participants who made it to the top 30 submissions and pitched at MegaHack Demo Day are eligible to mint this exclusive certificate NFT. The hackathon featured open-topic building across multiple tracks including DePIN, Stablecoins, DeFi, AI, Gaming, Infrastructure, and Consumer Apps with a total prize pool of $15,000 USDC.

concerts.additionalInfo:
**Certificate Minting for Top 30 Hackathon Finalists**

This exclusive certificate is available only for participants who:
‚úÖ Made it to the top 30 submissions
‚úÖ Pitched at MegaHack Demo Day on May 24th at Taylor's University
‚úÖ Successfully completed all submission requirements

**About SuperteamMY Mega Hackathon:**
A comprehensive hackathon designed to onboard new developers and groom aspiring founders in the Solana ecosystem. This open-topic, open-to-all hackathon encouraged building across multiple cutting-edge tracks.

**üèÜ Total Prize Pool: $15,000 USDC**
With prizes ranging from $500 to $5,000 USDC for the top 10 teams.

**üõ†Ô∏è Building Tracks:**
- DePIN (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure)
- Stablecoins
- DeFi (Decentralized Finance)  
- AI (Artificial Intelligence)
- Gaming
- Infrastructure
- Consumer Applications

**üìã Judging Focus:**
- Technical implementation and code quality (40%)
- Real-world impact and practicality (30%)
- Presentation clarity and demo effectiveness (20%)
- User experience and design quality (10%)

**üîó Resources Provided:**
- Month-long workshop series for skill development
- Comprehensive hacker pack with tools and documentation
- Networking opportunities with industry professionals
- Access to Solana ecosystem primitives and integrations

**üéØ Certificate Benefits:**
- Proof of top 30 finalist achievement in Solana hackathon
- NFT certificate on Solana blockchain
- Recognition in the Superteam Malaysia ecosystem
- Portfolio credibility for future web3 opportunities
- Access to exclusive Superteam events and networking

**‚ö° Powered by Solana:**
This hackathon emphasized leveraging Solana's high performance and low costs to create exceptional user experiences and innovative solutions.

**Eligibility Verification Required:**
Only verified top 30 finalists who pitched at Demo Day can mint this certificate. Verification includes submission proof and Demo Day attendance confirmation.

üöÄ Celebrate your achievement in the Solana ecosystem with this exclusive blockchain-verified certificate!
